name: Choose your side
description:
General

This project was made during the Community Game Jam in August 2019.

Synopsis

2030... Your school organized a visit in a nuclear plant right before the end of your last school year. You are in the bus to go there. Suddently; you feel your smartphone vibrating. You received a sms from you friend : Alien has arrived! Will they be able to live in the human world, or not? Choose your side and help your friends.

Tools

    Unity
    Gimp
    Aseprite
    Cubase

Issues

The game isn't over yet, the main engine has been created but a lot of content is missing, and we can't even find the theme of the jam.

All the listed bugs will be fixed after the end of the vote phase of the jam.

Made By :

    Badihop (Developer)
    Beescott (Developer)
    Raynorhs (Artist)
    Splifingald (Artist)
    VeryBadType (Sound Designer)
